address.cantfind: I can't find the address on the list

postcode-api.not-found: Sorry – we couldn’t find any addresses for that postcode, enter your address manually
postcode-api.cant-connect: Sorry – we couldn’t connect to the postcode lookup service at this time, enter your address manually

confirm.intro: Check your answers and make any necessary changes before you submit this application
confirm.footer: You'll be able to print and save a copy of the information you've submitted on the next page

confirmation.email: We have sent an email to {{values.contact-email}} to confirm receipt of your application.

survey.text: What did you think of this service? (takes 30 seconds)

confirmation.emailFallback: Thanks for submitting your request. We're having a bit of trouble with our email confirmations at the moment, but rest assured we've received your request, and a member of our team will progress it as soon as they can.
confirmation.emailFallbackContact: In the mean time if you'd like to contact us please drop us a line at dflu.firearmslicensing@homeoffice.gov.uk
